author: antelder
msg: Update to support the composite local attribute when writing out composite XML

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed a nasty bug I have introduced lately : if the lock.wait(timeout) in the await0() method exits because the timeout is reached, then we never get out of the loop because the test for the endTime is bad : it should use '<' instead of '>'

author: mrdon
msg: Adds support for settings.properties alongside settings.xml
